synthetic_data.raw_response:
{
  "data_sets": [
    {
      "name": "User Registrations",
      "description": "Synthetic user accounts created during the secure registration flow, including consent receipts and audit log entries.",
      "use_case_id": "UC-001",
      "format": "json",
      "schema": {
        "user_id": "UUID",
        "email": "string (email format)",
        "locale": "string (e.g., en-US)",
        "device_id": "string (hashed device identifier)",
        "consent_scopes": "array of strings (e.g., [\"activity\",\"heart_rate\",\"sleep\"])",
        "consent_timestamp": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)",
        "verification_status": "enum (\"pending\",\"verified\")",
        "verification_method": "enum (\"email\",\"sms\")",
        "registration_timestamp": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)",
        "audit_event_id": "UUID",
        "audit_timestamp": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)",
        "audit_action": "string (e.g., \"user_registration\")",
        "audit_actor": "string (e.g., \"Authentication Service\")"
      },
      "sample_data": [
        {
          "user_id": "a1b2c3d4-1111-2222-3333-444455556666",
          "email": "jane.doe@example.com",
          "locale": "en-US",
          "device_id": "d3f5a9c2e1b8f0a7",
          "consent_scopes": [
            "activity",
            "heart_rate",
            "sleep",
            "nutrition",
            "mental_wellness"
          ],

          "audit_event_id": "e9f8a7b6-5555-6666-7777-88889999aaaa",

          "audit_action": "user_registration",
          "audit_actor": "Authentication Service"
        },
        {

          "email": "li.wang@example.cn",
          "locale": "zh-CN",
          "device_id": "b7d3e9f0a2c1d4e5",

            "activity",

          ],
          "consent_timestamp": "2025-10-17T09:45:10Z",

    },
    {
      "name": "Wearable Observations",
      "description": "Real‑time health metrics streamed from BLE wearables, transformed into FHIR Observation resources and queued for sync.",
      "use_case_id": "UC-002",
      "format": "json",
      "schema": {
        "observation_id": "UUID",
        "user_id": "UUID",
        "device_id": "string (hashed identifier)",
        "timestamp": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)",
        "type": "enum (\"heart_rate\",\"spo2\",\"steps\",\"sleep_stage\")",
        "value": "number (unit depends on type)",
        "unit": "string (e.g., \"bpm\", \"%\", \"steps\")",
        "fhir_observation": "object (simplified FHIR Observation JSON)",
        "sync_status": "enum (\"pending\",\"uploaded\",\"failed\")"
      },
      "sample_data": [
        {
          "observation_id": "obs-001-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd11112222",
          "user_id": "a1b2c3d4-1111-2222-3333-444455556666",
          "device_id": "d3f5a9c2e1b8f0a7",
          "timestamp": "2025-10-20T06:12:03Z",
          "type": "heart_rate",
          "value": 78,
          "unit": "bpm",
          "fhir_observation": {
            "resourceType": "Observation",
            "id": "obs-001-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd11112222",
            "status": "final",
            "category": [{ "coding": [{ "system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category", "code": "vital-signs"}]}],
            "code": { "coding": [{ "system": "http://loinc.org", "code": "8867-4", "display": "Heart rate"}] },
            "subject": { "reference": "Patient/a1b2c3d4-1111-2222-3333-444455556666" },
            "effectiveDateTime": "2025-10-20T06:12:03Z",
            "valueQuantity": { "value": 78, "unit": "bpm" }
          },
          "sync_status": "uploaded"
        },
        {
          "observation_id": "obs-002-eeee-ffff-1111-2222aaaa3333",
          "user_id": "b2c3d4e5-2222-3333-4444-555566667777",
          "device_id": "a4c9e2b1d6f7c3e0",
          "timestamp": "2025-10-20T06:12:08Z",
          "type": "spo2",
          "value": 97,
          "unit": "%",
          "fhir_observation": {
            "resourceType": "Observation",
            "id": "obs-002-eeee-ffff-1111-2222aaaa3333",
            "status": "final",
            "category": [{ "coding": [{ "system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category", "code": "vital-signs"}]}],
            "code": { "coding": [{ "system": "http://loinc.org", "code": "59408-5", "display": "Oxygen saturation in Arterial blood"}] },
            "subject": { "reference": "Patient/b2c3d4e5-2222-3333-4444-555566667777" },
            "effectiveDateTime": "2025-10-20T06:12:08Z",
            "valueQuantity": { "value": 97, "unit": "%" }
          },
          "sync_status": "uploaded"
        "sync_status": "uploaded"
        },
        {
          "observation_id": "obs-003-3333-4444-5555-6666bbbb7777",
          "user_id": "c3d4e5f6-3333-4444-5555-666677778888",
          "device_id": "b7d3e9f0a2c1d4e5",
          "timestamp": "2025-10-20T06:12:15Z",
          "type": "steps",
          "value": 120,
          "unit": "steps",
          "fhir_observation": {
            "resourceType": "Observation",
            "id": "obs-003-3333-4444-5555-6666bbbb7777",
            "status": "final",
            "category": [{ "coding": [{ "system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category", "code": "activity"}]}],
            "code": { "coding": [{ "system": "http://loinc.org", "code": "41950-7", "display": "Number of steps in 24 hour Measured"}] },
            "subject": { "reference": "Patient/c3d4e5f6-3333-4444-5555-666677778888" },
            "effectiveDateTime": "2025-10-20T06:12:15Z",
            "valueQuantity": { "value": 120, "unit": "steps" }
          },
          "sync_status": "pending"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Workout Recommendations",
      "description": "AI‑generated personalized workout plans and associated recommendation events.",
      "use_case_id": "UC-003",
      "format": "json",
      "schema": {
        "recommendation_id": "UUID",
        "user_id": "UUID",
        "generated_at": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)",
        "model_version": "string (e.g., \"v1.3.2\")",
        "goals": "array of strings (e.g., [\"strength\",\"fat_loss\"])",
        "plan_id": "UUID",
        "plan_start_date": "ISO 8601 date",
        "plan_weeks": "integer (1‑12)",
        "workouts": "array of objects { \"day\": integer, \"type\": string, \"duration_min\": integer, \"intensity\": string }",
        "ai_confidence": "number (0‑1)",
        "fallback_used": "boolean"
      },
      "sample_data": [
        {
          "recommendation_id": "rec-001-aaa-bbb-ccc-ddd11112222",

    {
      "name": "Community Challenges",
      "description": "Active social challenges, participant rosters and leaderboard snapshots used by the community service.",
      "use_case_id": "UC-004",
      "format": "json",
      "schema": {
        "challenge_id": "UUID",
        "title": "string",
        "description": "string",
        "start_date": "ISO 8601 date",
        "end_date": "ISO 8601 date",
        "metric": "enum (\"distance\",\"steps\",\"calories\")",
        "target_value": "number",
        "participants": "array of UUIDs",
        "leaderboard": "array of objects { \"user_id\": UUID, \"rank\": integer, \"value\": "number }",
        "reward_tier": "string (e.g., \"bronze\",\"silver\",\"gold\")"
      },
      "sample_data": [
        {

    {
      "name": "Nutrition Logs",
      "description": "User‑generated meal entries with macro/micro nutrient breakdown, sourced from barcode scans or manual search.",
      "use_case_id": "UC-005",
      "format": "json",
      "schema": {
        "log_id": "UUID",
        "user_id": "UUID",
        "meal_time": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)",
        "food_item_id": "string (UPC or \"custom-xxxx\")",
        "food_name": "string",
        "source": "enum (\"barcode\",\"search\",\"custom\")",
        "portion_servings": "number",
        "calories": "number",
        "protein_g": "number",
        "carbs_g": "number",
        "fat_g": "number",
        "micronutrients": "object (e.g., { \"sodium_mg\": 210, \"fiber_g\": 3.2 })",
        "created_at": "ISO 8601 datetime (UTC)"
      },
      "sample_data": [
        {

  "summary": "Five synthetic data sets were generated covering user registration & consent, wearable health observations, AI‑driven workout recommendations, community challenges with leaderboards": "The JSON includes schemas and three realistic sample records per set, ready for demoing the Fitness Applicationn use cases."
